Reviews.Title: very small
Reviews.Author: beth bell
Reviews.Content: must use wand to text I wished they would of put a better description on the size on there but it rings and its a loud speaker

Reviews.Title: Amazon Rules
Reviews.Author: Karl Stading
Reviews.Content: Amazon, as usual, did an awesome job handling and delivering the product. The product itself is not up to meet my needs. It's way to small to accommodate my fingers. When you want to txt you have to turn it side ways, the whole phone. Then find something to tap your message out. It's really not a good phone for anybody that has to multitask either.
